events.name: onUninterruptableReflow
events.description: Fired when an uninterruptible reflow occurs in the browser chrome of a window.

filters.name: windowTypes
filters.description: Conditions that the window's type being watched must satisfy. By default it will satisfy ['app', 'normal', 'panel', 'popup'], with 'app' and 'panel' window types limited to the extension's own windows.

parameters.name: windowId
parameters.description: ID of the window that experienced the uninterruptible reflow.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The time that the reflow started.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The time that the reflow ended.

parameters.name: stack
parameters.description: The stack for the JavaScript that caused the uninterruptible reflow.
